fields.value: Replication Data for: Mind the gap: A review of simulation designs for QCA

authorAffiliation.value: BIGSSS, University of Bremen and Jacobs University

datasetContactAffiliation.value: BIGSSS, University of Bremen and Jacobs University

dsDescriptionValue.value:
Information, script  and data for reproduction of tables in manuscript and appendix.

Compared to version 2, I modified one line for each of the six simulations (three in the manuscript, three in the appendix). Maybe because of changes in the QCA R package since the first release of the R script, it did not run through anymore. I had to add ", na.rm = T" to one line checking for truth table rows that are consistently linked to the outcome. For the Ahn/Lee reproduction, for example, the new line now reads:
if(max(as.numeric(ahnleeTT$tt$OUT), na.rm = T)==0) 
This does not change anything substantively about the simulations or the results.
